metadata.title: CVE-2019-12247 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** QEMU 3.0.0 has an Integer Overflow because theqga/commands*.c files do not check the length of the argument list or thenumber of environment variables. NOTE: This has been disputed as notexploitable.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
